18#include "includes.h"
19__RCSID("$NetBSD: sandbox-rlimit.c,v 1.6 2017/04/18 18:41:46 christos Exp $");
20#include <sys/types.h>
21#include <sys/time.h>
22#include <sys/resource.h>
23
24#include <errno.h>
25#include <stdarg.h>
26#include <stdio.h>
27#include <stdlib.h>
28#include <string.h>
29#include <unistd.h>
30
31#include "log.h"
32#include "ssh-sandbox.h"
33#include "xmalloc.h"
34
35/* Minimal sandbox that sets zero nfiles, nprocs and filesize rlimits */
36
37struct ssh_sandbox {
38 pid_t child_pid;
39};
40
41struct ssh_sandbox *
42ssh_sandbox_init(void)
43{
44 struct ssh_sandbox *box;
45
46 /*
47 * Strictly, we don't need to maintain any state here but we need
48 * to return non-NULL to satisfy the API.
49 */
50 debug3("%s: preparing rlimit sandbox", __func__);
51 box = xcalloc(1, sizeof(*box));
52 box->child_pid = 0;
53
54 return box;
55}
56
57void
58ssh_sandbox_child(struct ssh_sandbox *box)
59{
60 struct rlimit rl_zero;
61
62 rl_zero.rlim_cur = rl_zero.rlim_max = 0;
63
64 if (setrlimit(RLIMIT_FSIZE, &rl_zero) == -1)
65 fatal("%s: setrlimit(RLIMIT_FSIZE, { 0, 0 }): %s",
66 __func__, strerror(errno));
67 if (setrlimit(RLIMIT_NOFILE, &rl_zero) == -1)
68 fatal("%s: setrlimit(RLIMIT_NOFILE, { 0, 0 }): %s",
69 __func__, strerror(errno));
70 if (setrlimit(RLIMIT_NPROC, &rl_zero) == -1)
71 fatal("%s: setrlimit(RLIMIT_NPROC, { 0, 0 }): %s",
72 __func__, strerror(errno));
73}
74
75void
76ssh_sandbox_parent_finish(struct ssh_sandbox *box)
77{
78 free(box);
79 debug3("%s: finished", __func__);
80}
81
82void
83ssh_sandbox_parent_preauth(struct ssh_sandbox *box, pid_t child_pid)
84{
85 box->child_pid = child_pid;
86 /* Nothing to do here */
87}
88
